official_title: A resolution to authorize James Estep, Manager, Computer Services, Harold W. Needham, Superintendent, Senate Service Department, and Joseph J. Fahey, Supervisor, Senate Folding Room, employees of the United States Senate, to appear as witnesses in the case of Common Cause, et al. against E. T. Klassen, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes James Estep, Manager, Computer Services, Harold W. Needham, Superintendent, Senate Service Department, and Joseph J. Fahey, Supervisor, Senate Folding Room, employees of the United States Senate, to appear as witnesses in the case of Common Cause, et. al. against E. T. Klassen, et. al.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize James Estep, Manager, Computer Services, Harold W. Needham, Superintendent, Senate Service Department, and Joseph J.
